experience: You and Charmaine both know Lawrence Dearth

*Manage daily functions for Direct business (E-Commerce/Catalog) for Denim Bottoms/Jackets.*Lead and direct all weekly cross functional team meetings for Direct*Analyze and review sales daily to react to trends and forecasts.*Partner with Planning to develop seasonal strategies and assortment plans.*Partner with Senior Merchant to ensure alignment with Retail division and support cohesive cross channel merchandising. *Accountable for achieving sales plans and GM$*Execute and manage website and all product integrity on the site daily, optimize sales by re-sequencing the site to drive conversion.*Collaborate with Creative & E-Commerce marketing team with photo shoots for monthly catalogues.*Stay abreast of fashion trends and the competitive market space.*Develop test strategies for new businesses and promotional ideas.*Develop and maintain vendor relationships to support business needs.*Shop the market on a regular basis to find the newest product, negotiate costs, terms and deliveries.*Must approve all purchase orders before planning signs off. *Partner with Product Development, Design and vendor partners to develop Direct Exclusives.*Strategize and oversee product promotions/markdowns for Direct and execute on the web.*Own input and maintenance of all master data in systems and buy tools.

*Junior Bottoms (Denim, Casual, WTW) and Jackets*Review the Weekly Performance Report to ensure On Order is accurate and determine potential risks and opportunities in the current trend of business*Analyze sales, item performance, and markup to ensure bottom line profitability is achieved and weekly flow is accurate.*Partner with buyer and planner in maintaining financial plans, inventory levels, initial markup, and controlling open to buy.*Develop collaborative vendor relationships communicating sales information and negotiate costing.*Maintain a level of product awareness to keep current on new products and categories.*Built two initial product assortments based on relevant trends for the customer, open-to-buy, and seasonality.  Presented to DMM and GMM.

*Missy, Petites, and Knit buying departments*Proactively sought out opportunities to improve profitability of sales floor by highlighting key designers and trends to attract customers to purchase.*Made relevant product recommendations based on history, knowledge of customer, marketplace and macroeconomic trends.*Maintained collaborative relationships and negotiate effectively with vendors.*Researched product, pricing, and merchandise presentation strategies to ensure competitiveness in market through comp shopping.
Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society, Dean's List, Asia Concentration

Graduate as Magna Cum Laude Specialized courses in Buying and PlanningAssociates Degree (May 2007), graduated as Magna Cum LaudeStudy Abroad Program May-June 2008 in France & Italy to study the different aspects of the retail industry in other countries. Included visits to museums, couture houses, textile companies, and other fashion business colleges.

summary: Insight Global is a national staffing and services company that specializes in sourcing information technology, accounting, finance, and engineering professionals and delivering service-based solutions to Fortune 1000 clients. Insight Global completes more than 33,000 placements annually in short-term, long-term, contract-to-hire, and direct placement positions through our network of more than 40 regional offices across the U.S. and Canada. The company has been ranked one of the fastest growing staffing firms for over a decade and named the 3rd largest IT staffing firm in America by Staffing Industry Analysts. We offer unmatched customer service by developing an in-depth understanding of client needs, providing qualified professionals, and tailoring managed services solutions for large projects, which allows clients to focus on expanding their business and achieving their goals.2016 “Best of Staffing Client & Talent Award” – Inavero Staffing Industry Analysts- 2016 - 3rd Largest IT Staffing Firm & 12th Largest Staffing Firm2015 - 3rd Largest IT Staffing Firm & 14th Largest Staffing Firm2014 - 4th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm2013 - 6th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 19th Largest Staffing Firm2012 - 8th Largest IT Staffing Firm & 20th Largest Staffing Firm2011 - #5 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm 2010 - #2 Fastest Growing & 9th Largest IT Staffing Firm2009 - #4 Fastest Growing & 14th Largest IT Staffing Firm2008 - #4 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm2007 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm2006 - #1 Fastest Growing IT Staffing Firm
